Matej Latin

UX designer, author, minimalist, bookworm, typography geek.

Home About Personal notes Articles Books

Design, minimalism & typography

My name is Matej [mʌt-eɪ]. My story began in a small seaside town in Slovenia. Aged 13, I joined an after-school class where I handcrafted my first website and it changed my life. It made me who I am today — it made me a designer.

My passion for simple, clean & usable design took me to a journey through Germany, Luxembourg, England and now Scotland — from where I work remotely as a Senior UX Designer at GitLab.

I spend my free time working on personal side projects and create things like Better Web Type, Gutenberg—A Meaningful Web Typography Starter Kit and Equilateral Triangle of a Perfect Paragraph.
